resources.string: Taking your medication properly is not easy, but now at least it won\'t be so difficult! \n\nPlease, take a look at what we have for you!

A routine is a time of the day at which you usually need to take some meds.\n\nDo you take multiple medications at breakfast or lunch? Create a routine for that time, and Medicine Manager will group all your intakes in a single notification.
Keep all your drugs under control using the medication kit, and get easy access to package leaflets in the Spanish Agency for Medicines and Health Products.
Create your medication agenda by using the schedules editor. You can link your intakes to your routines, define hourly or daily repetitions and much more!
Medicine Manager will remind you about all your intakes. Remember to confirm, or we will notify you again! \n\nCustomize alarms in the settings menu.
Medicine Manager allows you to manage the medication of several patients, with their own medication kit, routines and schedules. \n\nYou will see all their intakes in the home screen.
